item.title: EU investigates Elon Musk's X over Grok AI sexual deepfakes
item.description: The Commission will assess whether “manipulated sexually explicit images” have been shown to users in the EU.

item.description: European Commission says its investigation will examine if the AI tool has met its legal obligations.
